summary: Adds more bloodshot eye color options.
descriptionHtml:
Additional Bloodshot Eyes

Description:

Adds new eye color options using no originally made textures, only they are just combined vanilla eye colors with the vanilla bloodshot eyewhites.
That way your insomniac and drunkard characters can have appropriately bloodshot eyes of any vanilla color.

Those colors being: Amber, Dark Blue, Bright Green, Grey, Hazel, Hazel Brown, Ice Blue, light grey, yellow 

As of now none of the original textures are replaced. 

Only available to human races of either sex.
==================
Installation:

Manually, you drag the .esp and Textures into Skyrim's Data folder. Merge Textures if asked.
NMM should do be able to do the work for you though.
==================
Un-Installation:

Manually, you delete BloodshotEyes.esp and go into Textures > actors > character > eyes and delete all the .dds files ending in "bloodshot". 
=================

Planned Soon-ish (do tell me if you object):
I plan to replace the vanilla bloodshot irises to look identical their non-bloodshot counterparts.
Textures to be placed in own sub-folder (eyes > additionalbloodshot) to make manual un-installation easier.
Also a version using the HQ Xenius eyes is likely. :)

I'd be nice if you told me of any apparent mistakes! Thanks.
=================
Tools Used: Gimp and Creation Kit.
author: Iole
